CustomField.formula: if(LEN( Shipping2Street__c ) > 0, Shipping2Street__c & " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN( Shipping2City__c ) > 0, Shipping2City__c & ", " , "" )& if(LEN( Shipping2StateProvince__c ) > 0, Shipping2StateProvince__c & " " , "" )& if(LEN( Shipping2ZipPostalCode__c ) > 0, Shipping2ZipPostalCode__c ,"") & BR() & If(LEN( Shipping2Country__c ) > 0, Shipping2Country__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
